string.s: There it is! It's my way out of here!
What are you waiting for? Get out!
Come on, idiots! Open the door! We need to catch her!
Damn... Looks like I won't be able to leave without a fight...
You'd better find a good cover and prepare for action...
You found enough ammo earlier for this, didn't you?
I hope so...
Then it's time to focus, because they're coming in! Also, don't forget to pay attention to the environment! There are a lot of shit in this place that you can shoot to put them down!
There she is!! We need to hold this bitch until backup comes!!

RAIL SHOOTER TIME!!

<color=cyan>HOLD/RELEASE SPACEBAR</color> TO GET OUT/IN COVER
WHILE OUT OF COVER, <color=cyan>MOVE MOUSE</color> TO AIM AND <color=cyan>CLICK TO SHOOT</color>
YOU CAN PUT GOONS DOWNS EVEN WHEN THEY ARE COVERING USING ENVIRONMENT HAZARDS!
WATCH YOUR AMMO AND THE TIMER UNTIL BACKUP ARRIVES!
BASTARDS!! WHAT ABOUT THAT FOR A 'BITCH'!?!? YOU WANNA PLAY ROUGH!?
Nice shooting,
I don't know if I could do this without your help,
Come on, guys!! The Boss will kill us all if we let the girl escape!
Oh no... There are still more coming... I don't have ammo to fight them all...
I have a plan... Throw the gun in the direction of the auction room then go hide in the changing room...
They will think you hid among the guests and pass right through the door... Then the path will be clear...
It's a risky plan... But I don't have another option...
Oh no... It's that man from the airport... What's he doing here?
I can actually hear from here what he's doing,
Eeeeewww....
He didn't noticed me yet... But I already threw the gun away... What should I do???
I don't know how he's so calm after all that shooting... But I can say you have a few seconds to do something... Number 1 never last long...
Dialog... I think I know what you mean, That's an excelent idea...
Hey, asshole!!
Asshole!? Yes, please... I want to see your...
I hope you have horrible dreams, bastard...
Nicely done,
Thanks,
Putting this dude down was also very fortunate coincidence!!
While he's sleeping, there won't be no security checkouts at the airport... and there's a flight leaving the conutry in a couple of hours...
That's it... My ticket home!! I'll be able to board with the Goddess Slab without any more trouble!!
Remember you still have the security thing... plugged... on you... The sensors say it's safe to remove it now...
Oh... I'll... remove it before arriving at the airport... I don't wan't anyone tracking... me...
You should leave now while the cost is clear... Those reinforcement guys might come back any time...
Okay!! Ask Winston to prepare my tea... I'm coming home!!
Oh my God... I think he's finishing...
Hide there? But I would need to get closer to him... Not while he is...
No way... This man would never listen if I...
Nice shot, man!! You hit the gun out of her hands!!
Of course!! We need the girl alive if we want to have fun with her, right? I'm still not as sick as The Boss...
And here's the backup... Just in time for the fun!! Let's see if she can handle 8 guys at the same time...
_Oh my God... no... no... no... no..._
It's over, girl! The backup is here...
There's no way you can handle 8 guys at once...
Well... Not with a gun at least... Because we are all going to 'handle' you now...
_Oh my God... no... no... no... no..._
Oh no... I'm out of ammo...
It's over, girl! We know you're empty...
But don't worry... There are a lot of guys here ready to fill you up...
_Oh my God... no... no... no... no..._
Hey... You're making the girl cry... Do you guys think this is the proper way to treat to a lady?
Huh!? Who the fuck are you? Some fucking white knight?
Dude... You're new around here... So you still don't know...
Believe me when I say you don't wanna mess with him...
Finally... Some words of wisdom...
Sigh... Whatever... As long as The Boss don't think we were the ones who fucked up...
Just get the fuck out of my sight...
Oh my God... Thank you for saving me, sir... They were going to... to...
Shhhhh... They won't hurt you now...
I never tought I would find a kind soul around here...
But... Your voice... Sounds familiar...
Did you already forget about me?
No... No... Not you... Not you...
Easy now... We finally have the time and a private place... Just for us...
No... I just want to leave...
Sshhhhhh... Let's just get into the changing room over there, okay?
After all... You don't want to be given back to all those guys, right?
Here... Isn't this a comfy place?
No, sir... It's not... I just want to...
Hey... Now you shut up and listen...
Hello there...
Don't get startled or something, okay? You didn't shoot all those morons outside just to be caught by the reinforcements...
You... you...
I told you I was going to track your ass, didn't I?
I was noticing the suspicious long time you took at the safe room, so I decided to came here to wait and check how you were doing...
I was just about to go to my crib...
I stop here to take a leak...
...when I start to hear hell breaking loose outside...
...which is regular to happen between the morons themselves here... but it's quite rare to involve a hot thief like you...
I'm not a thief... I just...
You're definetively my type... always struggling... always full of surprises...
Consider yourself lucky I heard your sobbing when the shooting stopped... I'd never thought you were the one fighting out there...
Now... I don't care about what you're trying to steal from here...
Actually... I'd love to see The Boss taking the heat for being robbed by a silly girl...
But, you'll need to pay the price for me letting you go... Just a little exercise...
It's always about a 'price'... You all just want a piece of me...
Don't worry... It seems you're getting used to it...
Can't you just let me go? Please
No... You'll do as I say... You don't have a choice this time, so no whining...
Now... Let me show your position for the exercise...
Hands over there...
But... this place is filthy...
The guys looking for you out there would take you to a much worse place... So, DO IT NOW!!
Damn... You do have a gorgeous body...
But we need to take the wraps out of the way...
Not please... Not again... Leave my butt alone...
Are... Are you going to play again with my butt, sir?
Oh my God... What are you going to do ?
Oh my God... What are you going to do ?
Sorry, but no... But this time it's going to be the real deal...
I know you're eager for some playtime, girl... But this time it's going to be the real deal...
Something your buthole will never forget...
Something your buthole will never forget...
But let's chek this upclose...
Check the size of this tiny asshole...
You should have allowed me to use the Security Plug on you, girl... You would be much more 'prepared' for our next exercise...
Now you'll have to endure a harsher experience with no foreplay... Because the exercise is about me filling up your backside...
I bet you enjoyed using the Security Plug, didn't you? The telemetry data it sent to me was nice and smooth...
But the LED shows an almost depleted battery, so it's time to take it out and run some diagnostics...
Please... Take this thing out of me, but... I beg you... Do it gently... Please...
Ha... I'll make better than that... I'll teach you a neat trick...
Oh my God... What are you doing!!!
I'm showing your sphincter how it can put the plug out without my help...
No..... I can't... I can't...
Yes, you can... It's already beggining to move...
Anngg... Please... Stop...
Get ready... It will pop anytime now...
Yeeahh... Look how the plug streched you nicely...
Once you learn how to control these muscles, you'll be able to give unspeakable pleasure to men using your asshole...
I feel... I feel so...
Come on... Say it... It's the whole point of using a plug...
I... I... I would never say such degrading thing...
Maybe you'll not say it out loud... But I know you're thinking about the void you fell now that the plug is gone...
I feel so... empty...
Yeah, baby... That's what I wanted you to experiment...
But don't worry... Because our exercise is about me filling your emptiness...
So, that's it... Get ready to know the feelling of being properly sodomized...
Can you feel it, girl? You'll now understand that your toys are nothing compared to the real thing...
I can already feel your butthole twiching...
So let's not make it wait any longer...
Why do you seem so scared, girl?
This... I can... I can fell... too big... too big...
There's no such thing as 'too big', girl... The sphincter is a highly flexible muscle...
Yes... It may hurt a little a first... But once you adapt, everything will work just fine...
This so hot... It has to be properly documented...
Noooo.... You can't record me doing something so shameful...
Don't worry... It's for my private collection... For my own 'inspiration'...
And your focus should be in what is about to happen...
_oh my God... oh my God... oh my God... oh my God..._
All this tension only make things more difficult for you... Try to relax and accept what is coming for you...
Oh my God... No... It's going to tear me... it's going to tear me...
Shhh... Shhh... Shhh... Don't despair, now...
I'll show how this little princess asshole can embrace several inches of meat...
Annnnnghh... I can't believe this is happening... I can't believe this is happening...
Well... You better believe it... There's a nice real big cock rubbing your intestine from inside...
But the feeling of emptiness left by the plug is gone again, right? Once you repeat a few more times this cycle, you won't want anything else...
You'll be craving to be fucked in the ass every single day...
After we finish, you should practice more with your toys...
Soon you'll be a pro on taking up the ass...
For now... Let's start the exercise...
Yeeahh... This is the meaning of life... Don't you think, girl?
Unnh... I...... mmnggh... I can't...... oooww... think... straight...
Of course... The first time is a heavy sensory overload for you... Should be hard to concentrate...
Some scientists speculate the loss of cognition due to sensory overload while having intense anal sex is one of the causes of the 'bimbo girl' phenomena...
You should take care to not walk that path, though... I like you the way you are...
Ahhhnnnnnngggg... My aaaass... is..... on fiiiiire...
That's a good sign... It's signals the end of the pain and the start of the pleasure...
Can you feel my testicles tingling your clitoris? You have all you need to climax with me... I'll speed up the pace to help you...
Oh my God... Why.... Why.... Why does this feel so good?
Congratulations for climaxing during your first real anal session... Now it's my turn...
Please... It's... enough... My butt is sore...
Sigh... Maybe you're still not ready to feel good while being fucked this way...
Well... At least I can feel good... I'll show you some mercy and finish it already...
Nooo... Slow down!! Slow down!!
Here it comes...
Yeeaahhh... Feel this heat inside you... It's called a sperm enema...
Damn... That was good... Let's see the result...
Nice... Check out how it leaks beautifully...
You did good, girl... I'll even let you pass through the airport with your stolen item now...
I want to see the face of The Boss when they tell him you escaped...
I'm also dropping a gift to you in your backpack...
I hope we'll still see each other one day... Bye bye!!
He just... left me here... like this...
Uuuhhh...
You should definetively get out of there... now...
I was hoping to have a little time to clean up... and... expel all the... the....... out of my....
Those reinforcement guys might come back any time...
The path to the exit is clear... and there's a flight leaving the conutry in a couple of hours...
Just run to the airport and get back home with the artifact... I heard you have... free pass... with the security, right?
....... okay... I just hope the airplane have very comfortable seats, I... I don't know if I'll be able to... sit straight...
Get out of there... NOW!
Okay... I... I'm coming home...
